Class PermissionEnum

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.permissions.PermissionEnum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPermissionDefault

    public abstract class PermissionEnum
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPermissionDefault
    Basic implementation of IPermissionDefault that supplies additional function routines
